Social media posts of luxury Mercedes-Benz on Auckland beach with ‘clown mask’ driver leads to arrest of Head Hunter https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/social-media-posts-of-luxury-mercedes-benz-on-auckland-beach-with-clown-mask-driver-leads-to-arrest-of-猎头/3UOS7POXWZBE5NT7L3LTSIM3H4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/social-media-posts-of-luxury-mercedes-benz-on-auckland-beach-with-clown-mask-driver-leads-to-arrest-of-猎头/3UOS7POXWZBE5NT7L3LTSIM3H4/ Jared SavageBut the gang member has hit back online to claim that he wasn't wearing the clown mask. Israel-Hamas war: Sadness for Kiwi family after premature Palestinian baby Sabreen Jouda dies https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/israel-hamas-war-sadness-for-kiwi-family-after-premature-palestinian-baby-sabreen-jouda-dies/72LLZDCGE5FOFNUKHQAFZEELIU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/israel-hamas-war-sadness-for-kiwi-family-after-premature-palestinian-baby-sabreen-jouda-dies/72LLZDCGE5FOFNUKHQAFZEELIU/ Baby Sabreen loses fight for survival after being cut from dead mother’s womb.
